${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Outspeed.NAME: Outspeed
${modID}:Outspeed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next !M! turns.

${modID}:Bite.NAME: Bite
${modID}:Bite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! additional cards at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:PleaseThisIsNotABarFight.NAME: Is This A Bar Fight?
${modID}:PleaseThisIsNotABarFight.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Put a *Maybe *It *Is... into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:PleaseThisIsNotABarFight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Put a *Maybe *It *Is...+ into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:OrMaybeItIs.NAME: Maybe It Is...
${modID}:OrMaybeItIs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Put a *Is *This *A *Bar *Fight? into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:OrMaybeItIs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Put a *Is *This *A *Bar *Fight?+ into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DarkInferno.NAME: Dark Inferno
${modID}:DarkInferno.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Add !M! Burn to your discard pile.
